original_text: So they read in the book in the law of God distinctly, and gave the sense, and caused them to understand the reading.
korean_text: 하나님의 율법책을 낭독하고 그 뜻을 해석하여 백성에게 그 낭독하는 것을 다 깨닫게 하니

sentences.original_text: So they read in the book in the law of God distinctly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 율법 책을 분명하게 읽었고

sentences.original_text: and caused them to understand the reading
